indexer.title: Anchor Indexer
indexer.subtitle: Indexing ANCHOR protocol messages from the blockchain
indexer.howEmbedded: How messages are embedded in transactions
indexer.carriersExplained: Carriers are different methods to embed ANCHOR data in Bitcoin transactions: OP_RETURN (standard), Inscriptions (ordinals), Stamps (multisig), Taproot Annex, or Witness Data.
indexer.storedInPostgres: All indexed data is stored in PostgreSQL

electrs.title: Electrs
electrs.subtitle: Electrum Server - providing efficient address and UTXO indexing
electrs.useDetails: Use these details to connect to the Electrum server

electrs.capabilities: Capabilities provided by the Electrum server
electrs.addressLookupDesc: Query transaction history for any Bitcoin address
electrs.utxoQueriesDesc: Get unspent transaction outputs for addresses
electrs.transactionSearchDesc: Find transactions by hash or address

electrum.title: Electrum Server
electrum.subtitle: Choose and manage your Electrum server
electrum.electrsDesc: Lightweight, fast sync, lower resource usage
electrum.fulcrumDesc: Full-featured, faster queries, higher resource usage

tailscale.title: Tailscale VPN
tailscale.subtitle: Connect your Anchor stack to your Tailscale network
tailscale.accessibleAt: Your Anchor stack is accessible at
tailscale.hostnameDesc: The hostname for this machine on your tailnet
tailscale.advertiseRoutesDesc: Comma-separated list of routes to advertise to your tailnet
tailscale.connectError: Failed to connect. Please check your auth key and try again.
tailscale.step2: Go to the Admin Console and generate an auth key
tailscale.step3: For persistent connections, create a reusable auth key
tailscale.step4: Paste the auth key above and click Connect
tailscale.step5: Your Anchor stack will be accessible from any device on your tailnet

cloudflare.title: Cloudflare Tunnel
cloudflare.subtitle: Expose your Anchor services to the internet securely
cloudflare.tunnelInfo: Your tunnel is connected to Cloudflare. Configure public hostnames in the Cloudflare dashboard.
cloudflare.getToken: Get your tunnel token from the
cloudflare.connectError: Failed to connect. Please check your token and try again.
cloudflare.configureHostnames: Configure public hostnames for these services in the
cloudflare.useInternalUrls: Use the internal URLs below when setting up your tunnel routes.
cloudflare.step2: Navigate to Networks → Tunnels and create a new tunnel
cloudflare.step3: Copy the tunnel token (starts with eyJ...)
cloudflare.step4: Paste the token above and click "Start Tunnel"
cloudflare.step5: In Cloudflare, add public hostnames and point them to the internal service URLs listed above
cloudflare.step6: Your services will be accessible via your configured domains

security.title: Password Protection
security.description: Protect your dashboard with a password
security.disabledDesc: Your dashboard is accessible without a password

security.passwordSet: Password set successfully. Authentication is now enabled.

networkSettings.title: Bitcoin Network
networkSettings.changeWarningDesc: Changing the Bitcoin network requires modifying the Docker Compose configuration and restarting all services. This cannot be done from the UI currently.

networks.testnetDesc: Test network - testnet coins have no value

language.title: Language
language.reloadRequiredDesc: Reload the page to apply language changes
language.note: Language support is currently limited. Full internationalization is planned for a future release.
language.transifexInfo: Translation files are located at /public/locales/[lang]/common.json. These can be synced with Transifex for collaborative translation management.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.backupDesc: Notify when backups complete or fail
notifications.serviceDesc: Notify when services start, stop, or crash
notifications.note: Browser notifications require additional setup and user permission. Currently, notifications are shown within the dashboard interface only.
notifications.historyDesc: View and manage all your notifications

dashboardSettings.title: Dashboard Widgets
dashboardSettings.visitDashboard: Visit the dashboard to set up your widgets.

data.title: Data Management
data.description: Export, import, or reset your settings
data.exportDesc: Download all settings as a JSON file
data.importDesc: Restore settings from a backup file
data.resetDesc: Clear all settings and restore defaults. This will also disable password protection.
data.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset ALL settings to defaults? This cannot be undone.
data.passwordNote: Passwords are never exported for security reasons.

factoryReset.title: Factory Reset
factoryReset.description: Reset everything and start the setup wizard from scratch
factoryReset.warning: Warning: This action cannot be undone!
factoryReset.warningDesc: All settings and installation configuration will be reset. Non-essential containers will be stopped and removed. Backup data will be preserved.
factoryReset.preserved: ✓ Backup data and Electrum settings will be preserved
factoryReset.confirmCheck: I understand this will reset everything and start the setup wizard
factoryReset.confirmRequired: Please check the confirmation box to proceed
factoryReset.success: Factory reset complete! Redirecting to setup...

lockScreen.title: Anchor OS
lockScreen.subtitle: Enter password to unlock
lockScreen.protected: Your dashboard is protected by password authentication.

themes.darkDesc: Dark theme with Bitcoin orange accent

themes.draculaDesc: Popular dark theme with purple accents

welcome.title: Welcome to Anchor OS
welcome.description: Your personal Bitcoin operating system. Let's set up your node in just a few steps.
welcome.feature1Description: Get your Bitcoin node running in minutes

preset.title: Choose Your Setup
preset.description: Select a configuration that matches your needs

custom.title: Custom Installation
custom.incompatibleError: Cannot select {{service}} - it is incompatible with {{incompatible}}
custom.requiredError: This service is required and cannot be removed

review.title: Review Installation
review.description: Review the services that will be installed

installing.title: Installing...
installing.description: Please wait while we set up your Anchor OS
installing.info: This process saves your configuration. You can start the services later using Docker Compose.

complete.title: Setup Complete!
complete.description: Your Anchor OS configuration has been saved. You're ready to start your Bitcoin node.
complete.step3Description: Your Bitcoin node will start syncing the blockchain

appearance.title: Choose Theme
appearance.description: Select a visual theme for your dashboard

security.title: Secure Your Dashboard
security.description: Set up a password to protect your Anchor OS dashboard
security.info: Password protection is optional but recommended to prevent unauthorized access to your Bitcoin node.

profile.title: Let's get to know you
profile.description: Tell us a bit about yourself to personalize your experience
profile.nameHint: This will be displayed in the dashboard sidebar
profile.funFact: Fun fact: Satoshi Nakamoto, Bitcoin's creator, remains anonymous to this day. Your node, your rules!

network.title: Select Network
network.description: Choose which Bitcoin network to connect to
network.comingSoonHint: This network will be available in a future update

regtest.name: Regtest
regtest.description: Local development network. Perfect for testing and building applications without real Bitcoin.

testnet.name: Testnet
testnet.description: Bitcoin test network. Use test coins to experiment with real network conditions.

mainnet.name: Mainnet
mainnet.description: Bitcoin main network. The real deal - use with actual Bitcoin.

regtestInfo.title: Why Regtest?
regtestInfo.description: Regtest is a local blockchain that lets you generate blocks instantly. Perfect for development and testing Anchor apps without waiting for confirmations or spending real Bitcoin.

monitoring.title: Netdata
monitoring.subtitle: Real-time system and container monitoring
monitoring.realtimeDesc: Monitor CPU, memory, disk, and network with per-second granularity
monitoring.containersDesc: Automatic discovery and monitoring of all Docker containers
monitoring.historyDesc: View historical charts and analyze performance trends

networkPage.title: Network Settings
networkPage.description: Configure network privacy and connectivity options for your Anchor stack.

tor.title: Tor Network
tor.description: Route Bitcoin traffic through the Tor network for enhanced privacy.
tor.privacyNoticeDesc: Using Tor provides enhanced privacy but may slow down initial blockchain sync. For fastest sync, disable Tor temporarily during initial setup.
tor.viewFullConfig: View full Tor configuration and hidden services

bitcoin.title: Bitcoin Network
bitcoin.description: Current network configuration for Bitcoin Core.
bitcoin.configNote: Network configuration is set in docker-compose.yml. Changing networks requires rebuilding containers.

tor.title: Tor Network
tor.subtitle: Privacy network for anonymous Bitcoin connections
tor.trafficRouted: Your traffic is being routed through the Tor network. Your exit IP is
tor.hiddenServicesDesc: These .onion addresses allow others to connect to your services privately through the Tor network.
tor.addressesPersist: Hidden service addresses are generated automatically and persist across restarts.
tor.torDescription: is a privacy network that routes your traffic through multiple encrypted relays, making it difficult to trace your connections.
tor.whenEnabled: When enabled, your Bitcoin node can:
tor.connectAnonymously: Connect to other nodes anonymously via the SOCKS5 proxy
tor.acceptConnections: Accept incoming connections from other Tor users via hidden services
tor.hideRealIP: Hide your real IP address from the Bitcoin network
tor.hiddenServicesInfo: (.onion addresses) allow others to connect to your node without knowing your real IP address.

themeDescriptions.bitcoin-orange: Light theme with Bitcoin orange accent
themeDescriptions.dark: Dark theme with Bitcoin orange accent
themeDescriptions.midnight-blue: Dark blue theme for night owls
themeDescriptions.dracula: Popular dark theme with purple accents

appDescriptions.app-domains: Decentralized DNS on Bitcoin - register .btc, .sat, .anchor, .anc, .bit domains
appDescriptions.app-predictions: Trustless lottery with DLC-based payouts on Bitcoin
appDescriptions.app-places: Place permanent markers on a map using Bitcoin
appDescriptions.app-oracles: Decentralized oracle network for Bitcoin with staking and reputation
appDescriptions.app-canvas: Collaborative pixel canvas powered by Bitcoin transactions
appDescriptions.app-proof: Proof of Existence - timestamp files on Bitcoin
appDescriptions.app-threads: Social threads and messaging on Bitcoin using the ANCHOR protocol
appDescriptions.app-tokens: UTXO-based tokens on Bitcoin - deploy, mint, transfer like Runes
appDescriptions.explorer-btc-rpc: Simple and lightweight Bitcoin block explorer
appDescriptions.explorer-esplora: Blockstream's full-featured Bitcoin block explorer with REST API
appDescriptions.explorer-mempool: Full Bitcoin block explorer powered by mempool.space
appDescriptions.networking-cloudflare: Expose Anchor services to the internet via Cloudflare
appDescriptions.networking-tailscale: Connect your Anchor stack to your Tailscale network
appDescriptions.networking-tor: Privacy network for anonymous Bitcoin connections and hidden services
appDescriptions.anchor-docs: Protocol documentation - kinds, SDK, examples, and API reference
appDescriptions.core-indexer: Indexes ANCHOR messages from the blockchain
appDescriptions.core-testnet: Automatically generates test transactions and mines blocks
appDescriptions.core-wallet: REST API for creating and broadcasting transactions
appDescriptions.core-bitcoin: Bitcoin Core - full-featured node with mining support
appDescriptions.core-postgres: PostgreSQL database for storing indexed data
appDescriptions.monitoring-netdata: Real-time system and container monitoring dashboard
